title: Due calendar event missed
content:
Hi, I have multiple calendard synced with caldav, everything works fine. But from last two month most due events are removed (hidden??) from thunderbird calendar, I think after dismiss them, but not sure...

I can sync my calendar without problem. In my caldav server and mobile devices this events are there, so I think they are removed o hidden in thunderbird, but can´t find a reason/option for that, is there any?

Thanks
creator: ruria

title: Attach terms and conditions by default?
content:
Does anyone know if there is any way that I can 'attach' my terms and conditions by default so they are sent automatically with every email that I send?

Thanks Jess
creator: sales338

title: Unignore message
content:
I sent an email to which i got a response and moved them (both) to separate folder. After that i accidentally ignored message that I received. After this I tried to un-ignore said message, but I couldn't find any way to do it. I tried ignoring and un-ignoring whole thread, but it did nothing.

I finally succeeded by copying whole thread to separate folder where said message was no longer ignored and copied single message back to where I wanted it to be. This is only partial success, as I have now thread with three messages - my original message, an answer that I received, and copy of that message that is ignored.

Is there any way to do it not in the roundabout way?

Thanks in advance, JD
creator: jedrzej.dudkiewicz

title: Deleting an email account
content: I have am email account which is now causing problems due to sending unwanted messages from a newsgroup I have unsubscribed from. I have closed the email account but the messages still come, so I want to delete the email account from Thunderbird, but I don't see a way to do that. If I try to delete stuff, Tbird demands the entry and won't close the demand pane.
creator: johnwoo3

creator: benati

title: Undo (ctrl+Z) deletes entire paragraphs after inserting a text from MS Word
content:
Hi,

In recent weeks, it happened to me repeatedly that while writing longer emails I pasted a section from MS Word. Then I noted that the text was formatted differently, so I wanted to undo the change and re-paste the text as "paste without formatting". As soon as I press on undo, the pasted text disappears with the entire paragraph where it was pasted and I cannot redo/undo the lost text anymore. This is very annoying!

I am using Thunderbird since years and did not observe this behavior before - so either it is related with recent versions or there is interference with some other settings/antivirus or other reasons in my computer that I am unaware of. Can someone reproduce this behavior and propose some way to restore the lost text? Or if it is a bug, can it be removed it in the next version? My Mozilla version: 102.12.0 (64-bit).

Best regards
creator: vishap

title: Thunderbird 102
content:
I have Outlook 2007 on a Windows 10 PC. I want to import all my emails and folders that contain emails, in the same order to my Thunderbird 102. I've already purchased the SysTools PST Convertor program and entered in a fresh PST file that included all my email folders, emails within, contacts, calendars, etc. I then loaded that PST file to the SysTools PST Convertor and created MBOX files (yes, plural as it created a different MBOX file for each folder I had).

Now I don't know how to import that to Thunderbird as each time I use the import feature and choose "Outlook", it replies with "PROFILE NOT FOUND".

I have no idea how to proceed since I tried to enter these MBOX files (as created by the convertor) into the Local Folders of my Thunderbird profile but just got the folders. Nothing was inside the folders after I restarted Thunderbird. Any suggestions here?? Can't find anything online about this.
creator: timwillms
